app.AddDrawer: Adds a slide-able layout on given side
app.AddLayout: Adds a layout to the app
app.Alert: Shows a popup message with an 'OK' button to exit
app.Broadcast: Used for broadcasting messages between DroidScript apps
app.CheckLicense: Checks if app is licensed with Google Play
app.ChooseAccount: Let the user choose an google account
app.ChooseContact: Let the user choose an image
app.ChooseFile: Let the user choose a file
app.ChooseImage: Let the user choose an image
app.ChooseWifi: Let the user choose a WiFi network
app.ClearValue: Deletes a variable saved via app.Save*()
app.CloseDrawer: Closes the drawer layout on the given side
app.CopyFile: Copies a file to a given destination
app.CopyFolder: Copies a folder to a given destination
app.CreateBluetoothList: Returns a new BluetoothList object with selectable list of paired and discovered Bluetooth devices
app.CreateCameraView: Returns a new CameraView object to access the device camera
app.CreateCrypt: Returns a new Crypt object to encrypt or decrypt a string with a given key or create a hash of it
app.CreateDialog: Returns a new Dialog object to display messages
app.CreateEmail: Returns an Email object for user to send emails
app.CreateShortcut: Creates a Home-Screen shortcut to an app
app.DownloadFile: Download a file with Androids download manager
app.Execute: Execute js code from your app or a WebWiew
app.ExtExec: Execute a bash script using Termux
app.ExtractAssets: Extract app assets to a local directory
app.GetFileDate: Get last modified date of a file or folder
app.GetFileSize: Get the size of a file or folder
app.GetMediaFile: Get a path to an unambiguous media file
app.GetObjects: Get map of created DroidScript objects
app.GetPairedBtDevices: Get list of paired bluetooth devices
app.GetPrivateFolder: Get path to a private folder
app.GetSpeakerPhone: Checks if the speaker is enabled
app.GetSpecialFolder: Get full path to a special media folder
app.GetThumbnail: Create downscaled copy of an image
app.GetVolume: Get volume of a given audio type
app.GoToSleep: Puts the phone into sleep mode
app.HasSoftNav: Checks if device has soft keys
app.IsAPK: Returns true if ran from apk
app.IsBtDevicePaired: Check bt paired state to other device
app.IsChrome: Check if device OS is ChromeOS
app.IsConnected: Check if device is connected to any network
app.IsFolder: Check if path leads to a folder
app.IsKeyboardShown: Check whether device keyboard is shown
app.IsLocationEnabled: Check if location method is enabled
app.IsNavBarOnRight: Check if NavBar is on righthand side
app.IsPremium: Check if user has a DroidScript Premium subscription
app.IsScreenOn: Check if device screen is on
app.IsService: Check id app is a service
app.IsStarted: Check if app has finished loading
app.IsTablet: Check if user device is a tablet
app.IsWifiApEnabled: Check if the mobile Wifi Access Point is enabled
app.KillApp: Kill an app by its pid
app.Language2Code: Convert language name to its code or get current language code
app.ListFolder: Get a list of files ans folders contained in a specific folder
app.LoadPlugin: Load an installed plugin to your app
app.LoadScript:
Asynchronously import an external JavaScript file.
See Also: @Script
app.MakeFolder: Create new folder in the local fs
app.OpenDrawer: Opens the drawer layout on the given side
app.OpenFile: Allow user to open a file with an external app
app.OpenUrl: Allow user to open an url with an external app
app.PlaySound: Plays a local or remote sound file
app.PreventScreenLock: Prevent screen from locking after some time
app.QueryContent: Queries content from the android content model
app.Quit: Quit the app with showing a dialog and exit after closing
app.ReadFile: Read the content of a local file
app.RemoveDrawer: Remove drawer layout from a given side
app.RenameFile: Rename or move a local file
app.RenameFolder: Rename or move a local folder
app.ReplaceInFile: Replace text in a local file
app.SaveBoolean: Save a boolean value across multiple starts
app.SaveNumber: Save a number value across multiple starts
app.SaveText: Save a text value across multiple starts
app.ScanFile: Adds media files to phone gallery
app.ScreenShot: Take a screen shot of your app
app.Script: Synchronously import an external JavaScript file
app.SendFile: Send a file to a remote target
app.SendMail: Open the EMail app and autofill fields
app.SendMessage: Send message from Service to main app
app.SendSMS: Open the SMS app and autofill fields
app.SetAlarm: Set alarm to open your app at a specific time
app.SetAutoStart: Autostart DroidScript Project on DS restart
app.SetData: Save data while app is running
app.SetDebug: Control the debug level of the program
app.SetDensity: Changes the dpi value for any control creatred afterwards
app.SetInBackground: Set services to run in the background
app.SetInForeground: Set services to run in the foreground
app.SetJoystickOptions: Set options for the connected joystick
app.SetKioskMode: Blocks android functionality outside your app
app.SetLanguage: Load the language code from lang.json
app.SetOnKey: Catch key events fired in your app
app.SetOnWifiChange: Called on WiFi connected state changes
app.SetSharedApp: Auto-Launch Project when shared data received
app.SetTheme: Change the theme of your app
app.SetVolume: Change volume of a given audio type
app.SetWifiApEnabled: En/Disable the mobile Wifi Access Point of the device
app.ShowKeyboard: Show keyboard on a focussed control
app.ShowTip: Shows a tooltip message on the screen
app.SimulateDrag: Simulates a drag event on an app object
app.SimulateKey: Simulates a key event on an app object
app.SimulateScroll: Simulates a scroll event on a scrollable app object
app.SimulateTouch: Simulate a touch event on a rouchable control
app.Start: Start your DS app in an html project
app.StartApp: Starts an app in a new window
app.SysExec: Execute a shell command on the android shell
app.ToBack: Put the app in the background
app.ToFront: Bring your app to the foreground
app.UploadFile: Uploads a file to a server
app.WifiScan: Scan for any available Wifi networks
app.WriteFile: Write text to a local file
